doc.doc-text: This is a path which will be matched with getPathInfo() of the servlet. E.g. If the servlet is mapped to /services/*, you would need "/SoapService50" here in order to match "/services/SoapService50".
The optional fully qualified name of the interface to publish. If you don't specify this parameter, you should be defining a "virtual" endpoint which is made up of multiple interfaces.
The actual implementation of the interface. If specifying a "virtual" endpoint this should not be supplied.
The Service Name to publish in the WSDL. By default it will be the name of the service interface class. Required if defining a "virtual" interface.
The Namespace URL to publish in the WSDL. By default this will be generated from the package name of the service interface. Required if defining a "virtual" interface.
Path(s) to add the virtual interface to.
The interface defining the methods to add.
The bean which implements the interface.
